mil7.7.6:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘meghassa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.7.6:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena uppannaṃ kilesarajojallaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho pathaviyā uṇhaṃ nibbāpeti;
mil7.7.6:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena mettābhāvanāya sadevako loko nibbāpetabbo.
mil7.7.6:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho sabbabījāni viruhāpeti;
mil7.7.6:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sabbasattānaṃ saddhaṃ uppādetvā taṃ saddhābījaṃ tīsu sampattīsu ropetabbaṃ, dibbamānusikāsu sukhasampattīsu yāvaparamatthanibbānasukhasampatti.
mil7.7.6:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho ututo samuṭṭhahitvā dharaṇitalaruhe tiṇarukkhalatāgumbaosadhivanappatayo parirakkhati;
mil7.7.6:8.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikāraṃ nibbattetvā tena yoniso manasikārena samaṇadhammo parirakkhitabbo, yoniso manasikāramūlakā sabbe kusalā dhammā.
mil7.7.6:8.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa catutthaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, megho vassamāno naditaḷākapokkharaṇiyo kandarapadarasarasobbhaudapānāni ca paripūreti udakadhārāhi;
mil7.7.6:9.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āgamapariyattiyā dhammameghamabhivassayitvā adhigamakāmānaṃ mānasaṃ paripūrayitabbaṃ.
mil7.7.6:9.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, meghassa pañcamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
